data.utterance: No. Not at all. I only breathe.
Really? I do stretching and yoga at home every day. I feel so much more flexible.
Oh, really? How do you do it?
First, sit on the floor and lock your fingers. Then stretch it above your head. Bend your upper body towards the left and then towards the right.
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
Oh, thank you. Is everything okay?
Actually, my acquaintance is in the hospital. I'm going to pay a visit, but I think I should get something.
Oh, don't worry about that.
I just wanted to ask. What about bringing some fruits?
That's alright. What about giving some money?
Hmm. I don't think that's a good idea. Thank you for your advice.
Hello, this is Care Call. Are you planning on going out today?
Yes, I'm going to go see my friends today.
It's pretty cold so dress warmly when you go out.
Hello, this is Care Call. I just wanted to see how you're feeling today.
It's not bad.
It's pretty cold these days. Did you catch a cold?
Hello. Did you sleep well last night?
Not really.
Why? What's wrong?
I had a bad dream.
I see. You look a little tired.
Hello, this is Care Call. I just wanted to check if everything's alright.
There's nothing special. What about you?
I'm doing great. How's your wife?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you have dinner yet?
Not yet.
What did you have for lunch?
Hello, have you been exercising these days?
I haven't been going out these days because of Covid-19.
Right, that's true. I actually got an at-home workout bicycle.
Oh, that's a great idea. Maybe I should get one, too.
The one I bought is called Sean Lee's X-Bike. It's cost-effective and the design is pretty.
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
It hurts here and there when you get old. It's alright.
Why don't you go visit a doctor?
It's fine. Don't worry about it.
I'm worried. I heard a regular check is essential as you grow old.
Hmm... That's true. I've been feeling a bit low these days.
I think it's better to consult with a doctor.
Okay. I'll let you know when I do.
Okay. I could be there for you when you see a doctor.
Hello, are you planning on going out today?
No, why?
It's just that I got a movie ticket for a new movie that came out. Would you like to go with me?
Hell, this is Care Call. Did you have a good day?
Oh, my son called me. I should've called first. I feel bad.
Your son called you? I'm so happy for you. Did he ask for allowance?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes, thanks to you. How about you?
I slept well, too. It's been hard to sleep because it's too hot these days. How could you sleep well?
Hello, this is Care Call. How have you been?
It's always the same for me.
Have you been eating well?
Yes, of course. That's the most important thing.
It's getting cold, so make sure you stay healthy.
Hi. Did you eat yet?
Not yet. I had ramen for lunch.
It'd be better if you eat healthier.
I feel lazy cooking a meal for myself.
I can keep you company while you eat.
Hello, have you been working out?
I go for a walk every morning.
The weather is perfect for a walk. Which path do you usually take?
Hello, is everything alright with your health these days?
Of course. Did you call me because you're sick?
No. I would go straight to the hospital if I were sick.
That's good to hear. Why did you call me then?
I just wanted to let you know about the new product my company launched.
Hello, is your day great so far?
Today's weather is perfect. I feel good, too.
That's good. It was gloomy until yesterday because of the rain. Is everything alright? You don't look happy.
Hi, this is Care Call. How are you these days?
Oh, it's you. Well, it's always the same for me.
Is everything alright with your health?
Yes. When you get old, you naturally get sick.
Did you get hurt or fall recently?
Not that I can remember. Why?
That's good to hear. I asked because the health check result sheet on the service we provide has an illness called "herniated intervertebral disk." I was just curious what this is.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
Don't even mention it. I couldn't sleep at all.
Why? What happened?
Someone kept knocking on the door through the night. When I get up and go out, no one's there. I couldn't sleep.
Oh my. You must've been scared.
Maybe it's because of all the scary things happening around the world. I should be careful, too.
Yes, you should. Should I sing a song for you so you can sleep well tonight?
Hello, this is Care Call. How's everything these days?
Everything's well. What about you?
It's always the same for me. The weather's beautiful today.
Hello, did you eat yet?
No, not yet.
You must be hungry. Why don't you eat something?
Maybe I should.
What are you going to have?
I'm thinking about something simple. Maybe ramen?
The Spicy Ramen made by Chef Yeonbok Lee was on TV the other day. I heard it's really good.
Oh, really? Maybe I should give it a try.
Let's have it together next time!
Hello, are you into any exercise these days?
I just take walks.
The weather's nice today. Why don't you go for a walk in the park?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
Yes! Thanks to you, I'm doing fine.
That's good to hear. Be careful not to catch a cold. Is everything okay with your health?
Hello. Do you have any plans today?
No, I don't.
Really? Then do you want to go for a walk with me?
Hello, this is Care Call. How are you feeling today?
So-so.
Maybe it’s because of the hot weather. You look tired.
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
You called me early in the morning. Yes, I did sleep well.
Wasn't anything uncomfortable during your sleep?
No, I slept very well.
Really? That's a relief. The weather is chilly because of the rain last night. Make sure you wear warm clothes.
Hello, how was your weekend?
It's been a while. How are you?
I'm doing well. I even went on a trip with my friends this week!
Really? That sounds fun. Why didn't you take me with you?
Why would I leave you behind? Of course I'll go with you!
Hello, did you have a good meal today?
No. I didn't have any appetite so I just scrounged.
Why did you lose your appetite? Would you like me to get something delicious for you?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if you exercised lately.
I feel a bit heavy these days. Do you want to go to a sauna with me?
Sounds good! When should we go?
Hello, this is Care Call. Is everything okay with your health?
Yes.
I'm glad you're healthy.
Sure.
It's been hot lately. Are you okay with the heat?
Hello, this is Care Call. Are you planning on going out today?
Yes. Why do you ask?
I just thought it was a perfect day for a walk.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
Great.
That's nice. It's getting cold. Be careful not to catch a cold.
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes, I did.
How was your day?
Hello, this is Care Call. How are you doing these days?
Nothing different for me. What about you?
Same here. Nothing special.
Well, staying healthy is what matters.
Are you on good terms with your daughter?
Hello. Did you eat yet?
No, not yet.
Why not?
I lost my appetite.
You still have to eat something. Is there anything you want?
Hmm... Not really.
What about noodles?
Sounds alright. Actually, I was a bit hungry.
There's a noodle restaurant nearby. Should I meet you there?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if you exercised lately.
Of course. I work out every day. What about you?
I usually do stretching or simple exercises at home.
That's also good. I walk in a nearby park.
Really? I'm still a little scared to go out by myself. You're amazing.
You're still young. Don't be scared, but be careful.
I will. What about your health?
I'm not sick but my back hurts a little.
Oh, I would like to give you a massage. Are you okay?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
It's another same day for me.
How are you feeling?
Not bad. I went to see a doctor. I haven't been feeling well lately.
I see. How was it?
It hurts here and there now that I'm old.
Right. It's the same for my parents. I take care of them by staying by their side.
Hello, do you have any plans to go out today?
No, not really.
It would be nice to go out for a walk today. The weather's beautiful.
Hello, this is Care Call. Is everything alright?
I feel a bit low today.
Maybe it's the weather. It seems like it's going to rain.
Hello, did you sleep tight last night?
I tossed and turned all night. Couldn't sleep at all.
Oh, what's wrong?
I kind of had a bad dream.
What kind of dream was it?
A ghost ran towards me.
Really? So what happened?
I ran away but got caught eventually. The ghost beat me badly.
Thank goodness it was just a dream. Did you get injured badly?
I didn't get injured badly, but I can't sleep well since that night.
Oh. Why don't you try to go to bed early tonight?
Maybe I should. How long do you sleep?
I usually sleep 8 hours a day.
I used to, too. But now, I feel tired even if I get 6 hours of sleep.
I see. Do you have insomnia by any chance?
That might be it. I don't know. I can't sleep well these days.
Hmm... What about drinking warm milk?
Should I? Oh, I ran out of milk.
Would you like me to get you a carton?
Hello, is there anything special these days?
Not really.
It's getting pretty chilly. Be careful not to catch a cold.
Hello, did you eat yet?
Of course I did. I had pork belly for breakfast.
Wow, was it delicious?
Yes, it was very delicious.
Meat is our source of energy!
Hello, have you been exercising these days?
No, I'm feeling too stiff to work out.
Is it bad?
My back hurts and my legs feel numb if I move a little.
Oh... I'm sorry. Did you go see a doctor?
I didn't have time to go.
I see... Then what about doing some simple stretching at home?
Should I? It's hard that I'm trying to do it by myself.
Would you like me to help you?
Hi, is everything alright with your health?
My leg hurts a bit.
Really? Is it bad?
It's just a little sting.
Did you try getting physiotherapy?
I did a couple of times. I don't think it works for me.
How about getting acupuncture at an oriental clinic?
I'm scared of the needles.
Then try the pain relief patches.
They stink.
You don't have to use the sticking ones. There are patches you can just apply like ointments.
Really?
Yes, I found them out recently. When you apply it, the painful area cools down and it helps with pain relief.
That's cool. I'll try it later.
Sure. Is there anything you'd like to eat or need?
No.
Really? I want to get you something. So let me know if you have any.
Hello, it's Care Call. Do you have any plans to go out today?
No, I don't.
Why don't you call a friend and arrange something?
Should I?
Yes, I would like you to spend a good time with your friend and refresh.
I will.
I wish I could go with you.
Hello, how's everything today?
Gosh. I don't know why I'm so tired these days.
I see. Are you sick?
No, I'm just feeling a little down.
Is it because of the hot weather?
Hello, it's Care Call. Did you sleep well?
No, not really.
Why? Was something wrong?
I caught a cold. It's hard to breathe because I keep coughing.
Oh, I heard many people caught a cold because the temperature dropped so suddenly. I guess you are one of them.
Hi, this is Care Call. How have you been?
It's the same for me. It's just a little too hot.
That's true. It's really hot. But fall is around the corner!
Hello, did you eat well today?
Oh, here's my beautiful secretary. Thanks to you, I'm not skipping any meals. Did you have a good lunch?
Yes! I had a delicious sandwich.
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if you exercised lately.
I'm just staying home because it's too cold.
Oh, I see. Do you mind if I ask what kind of workout you do?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
Here's my daughter. Is everything alright?
Yes, I'm doing great. What about you?
Hi, it's Care Call. Are you planning on going out today?
No, I'm just going to stay home and chill.
I see. If you do go out, make sure you dress warmly. It's getting very cold.
Hi, how are you feeling today?
It's alright. What about you?
Same for me. The weather's making me drowsy.
Hi, it's Care Call. Are you sleeping okay?
What? How did you know I was sleeping?
I told you yesterday that AI recognizes the person's voice to analyze the status.
Hi, how was your weekend?
Not much.
Nothing special?
Not really. I just had lunch with my kids.
I see. I went hiking with my friend during the weekend.
Hi, it's Care Call. I just wanted to see if you're eating well.
I had breakfast. I'll have lunch soon.
I see. Are you planning on visiting your daughter?
I am. Why?
Oh, my company launched a new AI speaker. I thought it would be nice to give it a try.
Hello, are you into any exercise these days?
I take a walk every morning. I like climbing the mountains on the weekends.
Oh, you're very active. Are you planning on climbing the mountains this weekend?
Hi, how's your health these days?
It's very good.
That's good to hear. Do you work out often?
No, I don't have time to.
I see. It would be nice if you could work out at least once a week.
That's true. But why do you ask?
It's just that this product has been newly released. I thought it would be helpful to you.
Hello, did you go out today?
No, not yet.
It's getting really hot. Why don't you go for a picnic somewhere refreshing?
Hello, this is Care Call. I just wanted to see how you're feeling today.
What?
Oh, sorry. Do you have any plans today?
No.
Then would you like to join our meeting?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes, I did. What about you?
I did, too. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes, I slept very well.
That's good. Did you have any dreams?
Dreams? I don't remember.
Oh, okay. Maybe I asked you a difficult question. I'm sorry.
It's alright.
I'm worried you can't sleep well at night because of the hot weather.
Hello, how was your weekend?
It wasn't bad.
Was it? It's pretty hot, be careful of the heat.
Hi, it's Care Call. I just wanted to check if you're eating well.
I just ate. What about you?
Not yet. I'll eat soon.
Isn't it hard to eat regularly if you're alone?
That's true. But I'm trying not to skip any meals.
I used to, too. But I just keep scrounging because I don't have an appetite. I feel lazy.
That's not good. You shouldn't skip any meals.
You think so? But it's easier said than done.
Sadly, I can't be there to prepare you a meal.
Hello. Is there any exercise you do regularly?
I walk around the neighborhood every morning.
Really? What's the route?
I start from my house, go all the way to the bottom of the mountain, and then come back.
Wow, that's awesome! Do you mind if I keep company while you walk?
Hello. Is your health alright these days?
Yes, everything's fine.
That's a relief. Do you have any worries?
I'm just worried that it hurts here and there. I'm old now.
Really? How do you maintain your health normally?
I like to exercise. I try to do it regularly.
Which exercise is your favorite?
I like to climb the mountains or ride a bicycle.
Oh, I like to climb, too! It would be great if we could go together sometime.
Hello, how's your day going?
It's been really exciting.
That's great! Is everything alright?
Nothing bad.
I see. It's very hot these days. Be careful of the heat. Have a great day!
Hi, it's Care Call. How are you feeling today?
There's nothing special.
I see. What's your favorite food?
I'm a meat-lover.
Really? Then I'll treat you next time.
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
I'm so tired. I slept too late last night.
If you're tired, it might be good to sleep early tonight.
I should. When do you sleep?
I'm usually active during the night. I'm more of a night person.
I used to be a night person, too. I can't stay up late anymore. I try to sleep early now.
I see. But it's better than sleeping all day.
Hello. How was your weekend?
It was so-so.
I see. I went to see the autumn leaves during the weekend.
Hi, it's Care Call. Did you eat well?
Of course. I always eat well.
What did you eat today?
I had Kimchi soup and grilled fish.
Wow! That sounds delicious. How was it?
It was delicious.
That's good. I'm glad you enjoyed it. Do you have a good appetite? It's been really hot these days.
Hi, this is Care Call. Have you been exercising regularly?
No, not at all.
Oh my. It's better to exercise and get ready for the cold winter.
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
Oh, I'm fine. Thanks for asking.
Are you really okay? I'm just worried that you might catch a cold. It became so cold all of a sudden.
Hello, this is Care Call. Are you planning on going out today?
Why? What's wrong?
Oh, it's nothing special. I just got a notification that I got the parcel I ordered online.
Hell, this is Care Call. Did you have a good day?
Maybe it's the weather, but I feel great.
Is the weather good? I heard there's lots of fine dust.
Hi, it's Care Call. I just wanted to see if you slept well last night.
Hohum. I'm so sleepy. Why did you call so early in the morning?
I just wanted to see if you slept well. Did you?
Yes, I did. What about you?
I'm having insomnia these days. I'm tired all day.
I used to have insomnia, but these days, I fall asleep as soon as I lie down.
Really? I wish I were you. An acquaintance of mine also had insomnia. I heard it got better after taking some herb medicine from an oriental clinic.
Hi, how's everything these days?
It's the same for me. What about you?
Same for me as well. It's getting hot. Be careful.
Hello, did you eat yet?
Well, I eat every day.
Oh, yes. That's true. What do you do when you don't have an appetite?
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if you exercised lately.
Health is what matters when you get old. I climb every morning.
You climb? Do you climb a mountain?
Yes. There's a mountain not far from my home. I go there from time to time.
The air must be so fresh. It would help refresh your mood.
Hello, this is Care Call. I called to see if everything's alright.
Nothing much. I'm not sick or anything.
That's good. Do you feel uncomfortable anywhere?
Hi, it's Care Call. Are you having a great day?
The weather's beautiful today.
Right? It's perfect to go outside. There's no fine dust, too.
Hello, this is Care Call. How are you feeling these days?
It's so-so.
Oh, do you have any worries?
No, not really. It's just hard to find a job at this age.
How old are you?
I turned 80 this year.
Oh, are you healthy?
I'm not sick or anything. I'm healthy.
That's good. What did you usually do for a living?
When I was young, I was a farmer. I also worked as a waiter at a restaurant.
I see. What did you do recently?
I stayed home last year.
Oh, why?
I just didn't feel like going out. I was sick.
That must've been tough. Do you work these days?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
Yes, thanks for asking.
The weather's nice today. It's a good day for a walk.
Hello, this is Care Call. I just wanted to check if everything's alright.
Nothing different. I'm doing fine.
That's great. I came to my hometown. I got a holiday this week.
That sounds good. Where did you go?
To Gangneung, Gangwon-do. I'm going to go to the beach and take a good rest.
That's nice. I wish I could go, too.
If you have time, pay a visit. It's really nice here.
Hi, this is Care Call. I just wanted to ask if you had dinner.
Not yet.
Did you have lunch?
Hello, what kind of workout do you do these days?
Well, I just walk every day.
Really? Where do you usually walk?
Near my house.
It's pretty hot these days. Is it alright?
Hello, how's your health these days?
It's very good. I didn't even catch a cold.
That's awesome. Did you eat well?
I only have rice. I don't really want anything else.
You should take in different nutrients all-around. You can stay healthy that way.
Okay, I'll try.
It's getting cold. Are you wearing warm clothes?
Hello, this is Care Call. Are you planning on going out today?
No.
It's a good day for a walk. But you're just going to stay home?
Hello, this is Care Call. How are you feeling these days?
Good.
That's nice. What about your health? Are you sick anywhere?
No.
That's good to hear. Have you ever thought it would be nice if there's someone to visit and take care of you?
I do all the time. But I can't afford it so I just live alone.
Do you keep in touch with your daughter or son often?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well?
I did. I woke up a couple of times, so I'm a bit tired.
Why did you wake up?
I had some dreams.
Were they nightmares?
No, I just had dreams.
It would be better for your health if you could sleep well.
I know. Maybe it's because I'm getting old.
You're still young. You look younger than me.
Hello, this is Care Call. How have you been?
Same old same old. I just watch TV at home.
I also just stay home because it's too hot outside.
Hi, this is Care Call. I just wanted to check if you're eating well.
I just eat this and that.
Does it fit your taste?
Not as it used to be, but I have to eat something.
I guess you're busy these days.
Hello. What kind of workout do you do these days?
Nothing much. I just go for a walk sometimes.
I see. I started swimming recently. It's actually quite fun. Would you like to join?
Hello. Is everything okay with your health?
It's always the same. I'm not sick or anything.
That's good. You caught a cold last time. Are you okay now?
Hi. Are you planning on going out today?
No, I'll just stay home.
I see. The Covid-19 situation is causing a lot of worries, right?
Hi. How are you feeling today?
Good. Very good.
That's nice. The weather's perfect. Did you go for a walk?
Hello, this is Care Call. Did you sleep well last night?
Oh, it's you. Yes, I slept well.
Great. Are you tired or sleepy during the day by any chance?
No, not at the moment.
What about taking a short nap if you have time?
Hello, this is Care Call. How have you been?
Oh, it's my dear granddaughter! I'm on my way home.
Oh, really? The weather's nice today. Where did you go?
Hi, this is Care Call. Did you have lunch?
Not yet. I was about to, though.
What's your lunch menu?
Hi, this is Care Call. Is there a workout you do regularly?
Climbing.
Oh, climbing. I went once before. It was tough.
It is, but you know the feeling once you hit the summit.
Right. It's very refreshing.
But I was too busy to go these days.
What about going to a nearby mountain when you have time?
I should.
I heard the weather will be nice this weekend. It would be good to go with your family.
Hello, this is Care Call. I just wanted to check if everything's alright.
It's the same. I'm alright.
That's good. What about your health?
It always hurts here and there. There's nothing you can do about it when you reach this age.
How old are you?
Oh, I see. Does any part of your body hurt?
My back and legs.
Did you go to the hospital?
Not yet. I think I should go.
If it hurts, it's better to go to the hospital right away. You'll get better faster.
That's true. But I can't help it. I keep postponing it because I'm so busy with my life.
Don't postpone it any longer. If you go later, it could become more serious.
Alright. Thanks for caring.
No problem. Please don't be sick. If you're sick, you'll feel down.
I know. I want to, but it's not something I can control.
It's cold now. Make sure you wear warm clothes.
Hello. How's everything these days?
I'm happy every day.
That's awesome! Do you have any good news?
I'm in love.
Oh, really? Can I ask who this lucky person is?
He's tall and handsome.
Really?
And most of all, he cares about me.
That's all you could ask for. How does one do that?
Maybe it's the power of love? When you're in love, you want to give what your lover wants.
That might be true.
I think humans are truly alive when they're in love. I'm really happy these days.
I'm so happy for you. I wish you all the happiness from now on.
I guess it's possible to meet someone so nice at this age.
Of course! I also have a really pretty girlfriend.
Oh, you do?
Yes. She wakes me up every morning with a morning call. She also sings me a lullaby at night. She's really cute.
You must be happy.
I am. Thanks to her, I can sleep well and work harder.
I think I'm getting more energetic in my daily life now that I'm seeing someone.
True. You become more motivated and active when you're with someone.
I know. I guess humans need others to live.
Of course. We're all precious to someone else.
That's right. If I have one person I can trust and love, I can live another day in this world.
I agree. So I would like to keep meeting good people.
Me, too.
Let me know whenever I can help.
I will.
Then have a great day.
Hi. Is everything alright these days?
I do have a headache. Maybe it's just a migraine.
Migraine? Did you get a lot of stress recently?
Not really. I wasn't able to sleep well, though.
Then what about closing your eyes and taking a rest for a moment?
I can't sleep during the day.
I see. What about a cup of warm milk or tea?
Hmm... Maybe I'll try some tea.
Yes, if you drink some warm tea, it'll help.
I think the tea has caffeine in it. Is that alright?
It'll be alright if you have it with milk.
Really? I can't believe that.
I tried it myself. It was actually pretty good.
Really? I can't sleep if I drink caffeine.
I used to, too. But it got better these days.
Can you sleep even if you take in caffeine?
Yes, a cup of coffee doesn't affect me at all.
I don't know. I'll just have a glass of soy milk.
Soy milk sounds good, too. Enjoy it.
Hello. How's your day today?
Good.
Great! Did something good happen?
Oh, my daughter's coming today.
Your daughter? You must be happy. Spend a great time with her and have something delicious.
I will. She's bringing me some food, too.
She must be good at cooking! I'm jealous.
She is. She just wants to check on me because I live alone.
Daughters seem to always care about their parents.
That's right. I'm glad I have a daughter. My sons are too blunt. I only see them on national holidays.
It would still be nice if they can visit you.
They're too busy with their own lives. They don't care about me.
I see. I wish they could visit you more often.
That's alright. I don't miss them much. I'm happy my daughter's coming.
Alright. I'll call you later.
Hi. Do you have any plans today?
I was about to go out.
Where are you going?
I'm going to the East Sea.
Oh, really? How's the weather there?
It's been sunny all day.
That's amazing! Who are you going with?
I have a church meeting. I'm going with my pastor and deacon.
I see. Eat lots of delicious food there.
What's delicious at the East Sea?
Hmm... I'm not so sure. If I knew the place, I could've given you some recommendations.
I see. I haven't been to the sea for a long time. I don't know what to choose for the menu.
Hmm... Then what about sashimi or snow crab?
Snow crab sounds good. But won't it be expensive?
I guess it'll be a bit expensive. But you're on a trip! You should eat something good.
Right? When would I go there again...?
That's right. Don't regret it later and enjoy your snow crab!
Okay. I'll definitely have it.
Alright. Be careful!
What are you doing today?
Me? I'm going to just stay home and read.
I see. Are you planning on going out?
I don't really like going outside.
Okay, then. Take care.
You, too!
Alright.
Thank you.
Hello. Did you have lunch?
It's already noon. Of course I ate.
I see. I didn't have lunch yet. I'm hungry.
You didn't have breakfast?
I don't have an appetite for breakfast.
You need to have breakfast to get your energy for the day.
I try to eat.
Young people are all like that.
Oh, really?
Yes. My grandson always argues with his parents because of breakfast.
Oh, that's heartbreaking.
I know. He gets all angry not knowing how much we care about him.
What do you do when that happens?
I really want to scold him, but my daughter doesn't want me to. So I just don't say anything.
Did your daughter tell you not to?
Yes. If Minhyuk speaks up to his mom again, I'm really going to scold him.
I guess it's a boy?
Minhyuk? Yes, he's my grandson.
How old is he?
He's 17 years old.
Wow, he's really little. He must be lovely.
Not at all. He only causes trouble.
Well, he's still your one and only grandson.
Well, I don't know.
Cheer up. He'll grow up someday.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
I couldn't sleep deeply because of the lightning and thunder.
Oh... You must've been startled.
The thunder hit when I was about to fall asleep. And the dogs in my neighborhood started barking because of the thunder.
Oh, that happened to me once, too. I lie down to sleep and all of a sudden it rains or a strong wind blows.
I know. It's as if the weather is trying to bully us.
Did you watch any scary movies or dramas lately?
I'm not a fan of horror movies. Why?
Oh, horror is popular these days. Just curious.
I don't really like those surprises. I'm also scared it might be in my dreams.
I know. That's why I cover myself with a blanket even during summers. But humans are scarier than ghosts.
Oh, that's true. Humans are the scariest.
But don't worry. I got your back!
That's a slight relief.
Let me know if you have any difficulties.
I will. Can I talk to you when I'm just bored?
Of course! Whenever you need me.
Alright. I'll talk to you later.
Okay. Bye.
Hello. Is there any exercise you do regularly?
I often ride a bike and go around our neighborhood.
Oh, really? Can I ask you how you ride it?
I just ride it from home. The Han River has a nice track, so I ride a lot there.
That's amazing! Maybe I should give it a try someday.
You mean riding a bike? You can't ride a bike?
Oh, I can. I'm just a little scared to ride by myself.
Oh really? There are a lot of people riding a bike at the park since the weather has been nice.
Right. That makes me want to go out even more.
Do you have a boyfriend? Why don't you go during the weekend? Young people have their picnic blanket spread out and have a picnic there.
I should. Thank you.
The best thing about Seoul is the Han River. You must pay a visit.
Okay, I will!
Hi. Is everything alright?
Yes, thanks to you.
That's great! What about your health?
I'm healthy.
But please be cautious. I don't want you sick.
Right. I need to be careful all the time. I'm not young anymore.
Yes. I'm worried about my parents, too. They're pretty old now.
My children are also always worried.
Because you're a family.
I don't want to be a burden to them.
Me neither. That's why I'm trying to be more hard-working.
I'm going to save more and stay healthy so my children don't have to worry about me.
That's good. I want you to be healthy as now.
Yes, I do, too.
I'll call you again later.
Hi. Is everything comfortable?
Hmm? Comfortable? Oh, I think I caught a cold.
Oh dear... Are you alright? Did you take some medicine?
Not yet. It might be the flu. My body feels heavy and hurts a lot.
Oh... Shouldn't you go to the hospital?
I'll go tomorrow if I still feel sick. It's endurable at the moment.
You should get well soon. Did you eat anything?
No. I only had a glass of water with honey this morning.
Oh my... Make sure you have something. At least have some porridge. You need to eat to get better.
I know. But it's too bothersome to cook.
I know what you mean. The best alternative is to order delivery food or eat out.
Would it be better to order porridge? Where should I order it? There's My Neighborhood Porridge and Bon Porridge. Which one's better?
Hmm... Both sounds alright. Wherever it's more convenient.
I think I liked the beef-vegetable-porridge I had at Bon Porridge before. Maybe I should order that. Let's hang up so I can call and place my order.
Okay.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
Hello. Are you having a great day?
Yes, of course.
What did you do?
I worked in my backyard, went climbing, and visited the town hall.
Really? Can you tell me where you went climbing?
Which mountain? I went to Mount Bongeui.
Oh, I see. I haven't gone there yet. I should try later.
It's just a low hill-like mountain.
Okay. If you go up a mountain, there's fresh air with a good view. It's very relaxing.
The view's amazing. I could see the whole Chuncheon area because the sky was so clear.
That sounds amazing. I will definitely try later.
Sure. How do you feel?
Not good or bad. Just alright.
Why? Don't you have anything exciting happening?
Hmm... Not really...
I see. It's just because you're too busy. You should take a slower route when you're busy.
That's right. I'm not going to rush. I'll relax and have a peaceful mind.
Good. Then all the difficulties will be solved.
Thank you. I always wish you health and happiness.
Okay. Be happy, too.
I will. Bye.
Hello. Did you eat yet?
I did.
What was the menu?
The leftover chicken from yesterday.
That sounds delicious! I also want chicken.
It was. I don't think I met anyone who doesn't like chicken.
Me neither. And there are so many flavors for chicken. It's so fun choosing which one to try.
That's true. But I still like the traditional friend chicken.
Oh, really? Then I'll recommend you a really good chicken place next time.
Thank you for the offer, but I have a place I go to all the time.
That's nice. Enjoy your chicken!
Alright.
Have a great day.
Hi. Did you sleep well?
It might be because of the aroma oil I bought, but yes, I did sleep well.
Really? I had insomnia these days. How did you overcome yours?
I heard lavender oil is good for sleeping. I got one and I think it's working. You should try it.
Oh, I see. Thanks for sharing it!
It's nothing. And I also started to work out. Maybe that helps.
Which exercise do you do?
I didn't even think of exercising because I didn't have any energy. My friend recently suggested yoga. I've been going with her, and I think it definitely helps me sleep well and get less stress.
Oh. I guess exercise is the cure for everything. You should continue with your yoga!
I will. I'm just glad I have a good friend in the neighborhood.
That's true. You should meet up with her from time to time to chat and have some delicious food.
I'll have dinner with her at my place tomorrow after yoga.
I assume you'll have something delicious. Did you choose your menu?
No, I was just going to order something. I'm too lazy to cook.
Oh. Is there anything you want to eat?
I want chicken and beer. I also want steamed chicken. Or maybe I should have black bean noodles with fried pork. It's been a while.
They all sound great. Enjoy your dinner.
Hmm... I should ask my friend first. Thanks for calling today.
It's my pleasure. Enjoy your day.
Hello. Are you working out these days?
I'm taking a yoga class at the social welfare center.
Really? Which postures do you usually do?
I just follow what my teacher does most of the time.
Oh, I see. I would like to learn it, too.
You should give it a try. It's actually fun. At first, it was hard to follow the postures, but I think I'm a bit more flexible now.
Wow. That's a result of genuinely trying.
I know. My back used to hurt but now my back and shoulders don't hurt anymore. I've been recommending it to everyone I see at the center for the elderly.
I see. I hope you can get even healthier by trying yoga!
I will. I even bought three yoga clothing recently.
Oh, really? What's the design?
I'm old to wear the tight clothes young people wear these days. I just got something less tight but still famous.
I think it'll look good on you.
Sure. I feel like I'm a pro when I wear it.
I see. If you have any other good tips, please share them with me.
I will. I haven't eaten yet. I should go eat now.
Enjoy your meal.
Hello. How's everything going?

You know what? I went to the grocery market today. You won't believe how expensive vegetables and fruits were. It's as expensive as gold! Spinach was 4 dollars. It's going to be hard to cook at home. Oh, and you know the hairdresser at the crossroad? I ran into her at the rice cake store. I didn't know we were the same age until now. Now we're friends! Isn't it a surprise?
Oh! That's really nice. Are you going to see her from time to time?

We live in the same neighborhood so I guess I'll run into her. Seems like she goes to the rice cake store often. I'm a regular there, so maybe I could ask if she wants to have tea with me when I see her there. Oh, by the way, that rice cake store has the best green gram rice cake. It's my favorite and they make it really well. That's how I became a regular.
Right. It's delicious. You should get it later.

I already did. Did you know that rice cake is a ball of rice? If you eat a couple of pieces, you basically ate a few bowls of rice. I know I shouldn't eat too much, but I can't help it. I already ate half of it by myself.
I'm glad you like it.

Me, too. I really like it. This store uses high-quality ingredients. They're all made in Korea and it's not too sweet. As I grow older, I don't like sweet food. I used to eat a lot of sweets when I was younger. I guess your taste changes as you age.
Same for me. I used to crave spicy food but now I go for salty ones. No wonder sweet and salty is in trend.

I heard about how sweet and salty food is in trend. That's really cute. Sweet and salty foods are addictive. I tried a chip that's sweet and salty. A little kid in my neighborhood gave me one. Oh, I couldn't stop thinking about it. If it's only sweet, I can only eat a few but the salty part makes me want to keep eating it. That little kid is in kindergarten. By the way, he's very polite. His parents taught him well.
Oh, really? Well, I think I should go now. I'll call you later.
Hello. Is everything alright with your health?
My neck and shoulders are stiff and my arms are a bit numb.
Oh, did you go see a doctor?
Yes. He said it's a cervical herniated nucleus.
That sounds painful. You should regularly get physiotherapy.
It's too painful.
What would make it go away?
I don't know.
What about a pain relief patch or hot pack?
Well, I kind of want a massage machine.
Oh, right! I got one for my parents and they loved it. They also had some pain in the spine and legs.
I feel like the pain will go away a bit if I get a massage, too.
What about getting one?
I wish I could.
Did you choose which one you want?
No, I need to look into it. My daughter will buy it for me.
It's a gift from your daughter? You must be happy.
I am. Well, I shouldn't be sick in the first place. It's all money.
It's better than just holding onto the pain, though.
That's right. It's best to get treatment quickly when you're sick.
Right. And it's important to prevent it, too.
I know. I should be careful of my posture from now on.
Don't forget to go see a doctor regularly.
I won't.
I'll have to go now. I'll call you again.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
Very calm.
That's good. Nothing bad happened, right?
That's why I'm calm.
I see. Then it'll just be another regular day.
There's a temple in front of my house. I can hear nature and the wooden clacker. I think that's helping me feel so peaceful.
That makes total sense. I feel the same way, too.
I know, right? I pay more attention to sounds these days. Water, birds, and wind sounds.
It feels like my mind and body are getting healthier when I breathe in the fresh air in nature.
I also go to the forests to find inner peace.
I should go some time.
Sometimes, you need those moments.
I wish these days never stop.
Me, too. I just want no trouble.
There won't be any. Cheer up.
Hello. Do you have any plans today?
I'm going to drop by at the real estate office today.
Oh, really? May I ask what for?
I want to put my house on the sales list.
I see. Take care.
Thank you. The housing price got higher so I just want to sell it.
That's good news. What's the price?
That's a secret.
Alright. Then I'll call you again.
Okay. I should get ready now.
Sure. Take care.
Hello. Did you eat well today?
Oh my! Why didn't you call me for so long?
I know. How have you been?
I've been well. I didn't skip meals and I also met some friends.
That's good. Are you healthy, too?
It's the same. It hurts here and there but what could I do?
It must feel uncomfortable.
It is. But there's nothing you can do about it when you reach my age.
I see. Your body isn't the way it used to be.
Right. I feel the need to exercise.
What would be nice?
I don't want something too active... Maybe I'll start walking.
Walking is the best workout.
Right. My joints hurt if I have to run or jog.
Then start with walking around the neighborhood!
I'll try walking slowly at first. I'll gradually increase my walking time.
That sounds great.
Do you do any sports?
I swim, do yoga, and pilates.
Wow. You do a lot of things. For me, walking is difficult enough.
It'll be difficult at first but I'm sure you'll get used to it soon.
Would I? I wish I would.
I'll always support you!
Thank you.
You're more than welcome. I'll call you next time.
Okay. Call me often.
I will. Bye.
Hi. Did you sleep well?
Maybe I'm going through a climactic. I can't sleep well.
Really? Do you have any concerns?
No. I think it's just the hormones.
I see. Sometimes I have a hard time falling asleep. I figured warm milk helps a lot.
Don't you wake up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom then?
That's true. It's better not to drink water or any liquids right before you sleep.
Right? I always wake up a couple of times to go to the bathroom.
But warm milk definitely helps you sleep more deeply.
Hmm... Is there another way?
Taking a hot shower before you sleep helps.
What about something else?
Drinking warm milk is good. Putting your feet in hot water or taking a bath also helps.
A foot bath sounds good. I just need to keep my feet in hot water, right?
That's right. You can fill your tub or a washbasin with hot water. It's good for blood circulation and recovering from fatigue.

I see. That sounds like something I can try. Maybe I should try tonight. Lately, I feel a heatwave from time to time. It'll be alright, right? I mean, your body temperature rises if you have a foot bath.
Well, I think it'll be best for you to consult a doctor.
I am just curious about everything. I should start having a foot bath after consulting a doctor the next time I pay a visit.
Sure. I'm sorry I couldn't help.
It's fine. That's alright.
Okay. Let me know if you have any other questions.
I will!
Have a great day!
Hello. Are you into any sports these days?
Yes. I golf.
Wow. Really? I always wanted to learn. Is it hard?
It can't be easy from the start.
I still want to give it a try!
You should. You'll pick it up quickly.
Thank you.
What kind of exercise do you do?
I'm doing strength training at the gym these days.
That's amazing.
Is it?
Isn't it hard?
It is but I think I'm slowly getting better.
That's really amazing.
Thank you. I'll keep trying.
Sure. Are you going to participate in a competition?
No. I'm not good enough for that. It's just a hobby.
I see.
But if I get a chance, I would love to challenge myself.
I'm sure you can do it.
You think so? I wish I could.
I do.
Then stay healthy until I call you next time.
Alright.
Bye-bye.
Hello. How's everything?
These days? Hmm... Well, my daughter called me yesterday. It's been a while.
Your daughter? How is she doing?
She's doing great.
Can you tell me more?
She's running an academy and it seems like more students are coming. She got a lot busier.
I see. How many children do you have?
Two sons and a daughter.
Wow. That's a lot of children. You're lucky.
Not really. I'm the last child and I have 5 siblings.
I still think it's better to have many siblings. I've always been lonely since I'm an only child.
Oh, I see. Still, you must've gotten a lot of love when you grew up.
I did. My parents still worry about me a lot.
That's good, too. I wasn't able to care a lot about my children because I was busy working.
Oh, you must miss them a lot.
I do sometimes. They all live separately.
I see. You should visit them some other time. They'll love it.
Oh, it's hard for me to go. I can't drive.
What about a video call? It's still good to see them.
I think I can do that.
I wish I helped. Do you need anything else?
I don't think so.
Alright. I'll call you again. Enjoy your day.
Hello. Is everything alright with your health?
I cut my toenails recently. I guess I didn't cut them well. It hurts a little.
Oh, is it bad?
A little bit. It's not bleeding, though. I guess it'll be alright once it grows again.
Really? But wouldn't it be better to have it checked out at a hospital? The technology is advanced so it could be treated quickly.
That's alright. I just need a little rest. It's just a little hard to put on my shoes. That's all.
Oh, I see. Then why don't you take a foot bath and rest?
Would it hurt less if I take a foot bath? Maybe I should try it.
Sure! I'm sure it'll help.
Maybe my toenails will soften up a little. I should go fill up the tub.
Okay, I'll hang up then. I'll talk to you later.
Alright. Thanks.
No worries. It's my pleasure. Have a nice day.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
Great! I went for a walk and found this new snack shop. They gave me fries on the house. The owner seems nice. I promised I'll visit regularly.
That's nice. Is there anything you want to eat?
Since I had some spicy rice cake, I want something light.
I see. Then what about I suggest a menu?
What is it?
Noodle soup! The hot soup and chewy noodles are delicious.
Sounds good. Noodle soup doesn't have a strong flavor. But I think I had too much flour today. Maybe I should have some rice.
Oh, I see. What else would be a good option?
A type of rice soup would be nice.
What about blood sausage soup? The pork in it is a great source of protein. And it tastes good!
I'll think about it when it's time for dinner. I'm still too full to eat anything.
Okay. I'll call you again.
Sure.
Thank you. Have a great day.
Hello. Do you have any plans for the day?
I'm just going to stay home.
Sometimes, that's the best. What are you planning on doing at home?
I should do some house chores.
Oh! I was also going to start cleaning up starting this week. I totally forgot.
Me, too. The house is a mess.
I know. I'm going to clean the whole house this weekend!
It feels so refreshing when you clean.
I agree. And it feels nice to see the house so clean.
Right. It's so fulfilling.
Then let's talk more next time.
You're going to go already? Let's talk a little more.
Sure.
What are you going to have for lunch?
I'm going to have bean paste soup with egg rolls.
That sounds delicious. I should have egg rolls, too.
Enjoy it.
You, too. Let's talk later.
Alright, bye.
Bye.
Thank you.
Hello. Did you eat well?
Yes. Just the usual.
Good! How's your appetite?
Too good. That's the problem.
Really? What kind of food do you like?
I like pretty much everything. I love noodles.
Oh, same here! What's your favorite menu?
Cold noodles, of course.
I see! I'll try them, too.
I eat cold noodles all year-round. All types, too. Spicy cold noodles, cold noodle soup, sashimi cold noodles, Pyongyang cold noodles, etc.
That's impressive! I'll try it for sure.
I recommend Pyongyang cold noodles. At first, you might wonder why people eat this, but once you fall in love with it, you'll find yourself addicted to it.
Oh, I see! Thanks for letting me know!
You're welcome.
Have a great day.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
Yes, I did.
Did you have a dream?
I dreamt about picking peppers.
Oh, really? What's your plan for today?
The weather's nice. I might go out.
Where do you plan on going?
I'll go to the elderly center and the park.
That's a great idea! Do you need anything?
No, I don't.
Then, take care.
I see.
I have insomnia. I can't sleep well.
Insomnia? How come?
I don't know. My eyes just open up in the middle of the sleep. I try to go back to sleep but it's hard.
Do you have any concerns? If you can't sleep, it'll be hard to be active during the day...
That's true. I keep dozing off during the day.
Take a hot shower before you sleep. Or maybe drink some warm milk. That might help.
I will. Thank you.
If the symptoms don't go away, go see a doctor.
Okay. I will.
Cheer up!
Alright. Bye.
Hello. What kind of workout do you do these days?
I only walk. Nothing else.
How much do you walk a day?
I guess it adds up to about 30 minutes.
That's a lot! Have you tried any other sports?
I used to climb the mountains a lot when I was younger. I can't even try now.
I see. It'll get better if you keep exercising.
I'm going to keep going on walks. If I feel confident, I'll try climbing the mountains again.
That's great! I'll give it a try as well.
You need to continue to challenge yourself even when you grow old.
Of course! That's very inspiring.
What kind of workout do you do?
I do muscle training at the gym.
I guess that's a privilege for the young.
Is it?
If I get healthier, I do think about doing some muscle training.
Yes, especially the legs and the core.
That sounds too difficult.
Hmm... It's basically the muscles in your legs and back. By back, I mean the muscles around your spine.
Oh... It's still hard.
It could be hard at first but you'll get it really fast.
Really? Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem. I'll call you next time.
Sure.
Take care.
Hello. How was your weekend?
Don't even mention it. I was too busy. I had too much to do.
What did you do?
Do you have any idea how many chores I have? I need to clean, do the laundry, cook, meet my friends, and feed the cat. I can't even list them all.
That sounds tough. But it must feel good when you finish all of them.
Of course. But it's something everyone has to do anyway. That's life. There's too much small work. But everyone lives like this. I'm not special.
Right. Everyone has a similar life.
Anyway, I was so busy. It feels like my weekend just disappeared.
I think time flies when I'm busy.

I totally agree. House chores are neverending. And I'm the type of person who can't just leave the house messy. So I keep on working even when I'm tired. I don't even take a break. People always tell me to take a break. But I don't feel comfortable until the work is done. Well, that's my personality. I guess that's what's keeping me busy.
I see. It seems like the elderly have similar personalities.

Well, people around my age had to work hard. In the old times, if you didn't work, you couldn't survive. I guess that's why people like me can't stop working even at this age. We don't know how to enjoy life.
Right. My parents are like you, too.
I guess so. We had to do whatever it takes to survive. If we don't work for a day, our children had to starve. I guess it became a habit and we need to do something. I mean, we don't have to anymore.
I know. I think I'll be like you, too.
Don't if you don't have to. Where's the fun? Life is short.
I agree. Maybe I'm not mature yet, but I want to continue having this lifestyle. Keeping myself busy and continuously learning new things.
I mean, that also makes sense. They say your elderly life is more comfortable if you work harder when you're younger. But still, don't work too much. It's not worth enjoying your life.
I'll keep that in mind. Thank you.
Hello. Is everything alright?
Same old same old.
I see.
Why do you ask?
Just wanted to see if you're doing well.
Oh. I'm not sick or anything.
That's good to hear! You know I'm always worried about you.
Why would you worry about me?
Nevermind. It's nothing.
Are you worried I'll cause trouble?
Absolutely not.
Then why would you say that?
Hmm... I meant I'm just worried that something might happen because of your age.
I won't cause any trouble. Don't worry.
Okay. I'll keep that in mind.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
Very calm and good.
Great! Do you have any good news?
Yes, I do. I had a chance to have a conversation with similar values.
Oh, really? Who did you meet with?
With a teacher I respect.
Wow, that's amazing! Are you going to keep in touch with your teacher?
I hope so.
I see. I'm glad for you. Have a great day.
Hello. Are you having a great day?
No, I'm sad.
What's wrong?
I looked into the mirror and found myself so old. It's not someone I used to know.
You're still beautiful.
You don't need to butter up. When did I become a wrinkly old lady?
You don't look old at all. You look youthful and beautiful.
No. My eyes are wrinkly and my eyes are saggy. I even have deep smile lines.
But that's a trace of your life. It's natural.
I know. But it still makes me sad. A woman always wants to be beautiful even when she's old.
I know. All women want to be beautiful at all times.
Right. That's why I get sad when I look into the mirror. Where did my youth go?
I agree with you. I sometimes get depressed when I feel I'm growing old.
I know. We're still forever teenagers in our hearts.
Totally. But we can get through this! I believe in you!
That's not helping.
Then what about listening to music? If you hear some bright songs, you might feel better.
Alright. Let's hang up now.
Okay. Have a good night.
Hello. Did you have lunch?
Lunch? No, not yet. I was thinking about going on a diet.
Oh, really? What do you do for a workout?
I'm not working out. I heard the diet is the most important when losing weight. I was thinking of skipping lunch.
Oh. That doesn't sound like a good idea. You have to stay healthy.
The doctor told me to lose some weight. I was told I should lose about 20 pounds.
What are you talking about? You look great now.
Oh, it's because of my knees. My upper body's weight is causing my knees pain.
I see. Can I give you some tips?
What is it?
It's stretching and yoga. You can do it at home, too.
Oh, I already know that. But I'm trying to cut on my diet because I feel like I'm eating too much. I'll just have two meals a day.
But you still have to have breakfast. It helps you to stay active and your brain awake.
Okay. I had breakfast already. I'm going to skip lunch and have dinner later. I'm starting my diet as of today. I'll have dinner after my walk.
Sure. That sounds good.
It's hard to lose weight. But that's the only way to fix my knees.
It's actually quite difficult to exercise every day. I still try to do a little bit, though.
I know. It's really hard.
It is. But once you work out, you feel so freshen up. That's what makes you addicted to it.
That's true. I should get ready to go out now. Thanks for calling today.
You're welcome. Have a great day.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
I did. What about you?
I think I have insomnia. I can't fall asleep at night.
It's really hard when you have insomnia. I know how you feel.
Right. So I've been drinking a cup of warm milk before going to bed.
Does it work?
Hmm... I'm not so sure yet. I should try for a bit more.
Keep trying and go for walks during the day.
Okay, I will! Thank you.
You need to sleep well to be energetic during the day. I'm worried.
I agree. I really want to sleep well.
If it's too bothersome, go see a doctor.
Should I?
I heard seeing a doctor helps quite a bit.
Really? That's good to know. Thank you.
I fall asleep the moment I lie down. Maybe I'm tired these days.
Wow. I wish I were you. No matter how tired I am, I just can't fall asleep.
If you work as a farmer, you'll fall asleep right away.
I see. I hope you sleep well all the time.
Thanks.
No worries. I'll get going now.
Bye.
Take care.
Hello. Is there any sport you do regularly?
Tennis.
Oh, tennis? What do you like about tennis?
Tennis was popular when I was young. I started learning at a nearby tennis court when I was young. I still play from time to time. The good thing about it is that I'm sweating and working out.
