I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you.
Thank you! Have a great day.
Hello. Did you eat well today?
I did eat but I guess I ate too little. I'm a bit hungry.
I see. Are you craving anything?
I want sweet and sour pork.
Oh, that sounds good. I want it, too. Maybe I'll have it for lunch later.
Sure thing.
Then, I'll get going! Talk to you later.
Sure.
Bye.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
I tossed and turned all night.
What's wrong?
I took a nap yesterday. I couldn't fall asleep at night.
Oh, I see.
Yes.
Sleep early tonight so you can wake up fresh tomorrow.
Okay. I'm going to try not to take a nap today.
Sure! That sounds like a good idea. I should get going now. I'll call you again.
Sure thing. I'll talk to you later.
Take care.
Hello. Have you been working out?
I recently tried surfing.
Wow, really? Was it fun?
I actually started because it looked cool. I live by the sea. When I go out for walks, I saw young people surfing on the waves and I just couldn't stop watching them.
I should definitely try it sometime.
But it's actually quite difficult. I still can't do the take-off.
You'll do it in no time. I believe in you!
The coach told me to take time and not to overdo it considering my age. He told me to just enjoy it but I really want to be good at it.
No one's perfect from the start. I'm sure you'll be great if you practice regularly.
You think so? But I'm worried because I'm not getting any better. When will I be able to be on the waves?
Cheer up! I know you can do it.
Thanks for supporting me. But I'm a little disappointed.
Please don't be. Just try again and again. You can do it!
Alright. Practice makes perfect!
Thank you and have a nice day.
Hi. How was your weekend?
I went to a nail salon to lighten up my mood.
Oh, really? What color did you paint?
I mixed up pink and white.
Wow! That must be pretty.
It's worth the money. No wonder you keep having to take care of yourself.
That's true. I really want to get it someday, too.
You haven't been to a nail salon? You must try it. It really makes your day.
I haven't. But I will when I get the chance to.
Sure. I used to go with my daughter but now that she moved, we can't go together like we used to.
Does she live far away?
We used to live in the same neighborhood. Now, it takes about 30 minutes by car.
I see. You must miss her a lot.
It's alright. She's all grown up now. I do miss not having anyone to see when I'm bored, though.
It's still different from having her near you. You could've gone shopping, eaten out, or gone to the movies together.
Right. It was really nice. But she lives in a better house now. It's a new apartment.
That's nice. I wish her the best of luck.
Good.
Then have a nice day.
Sure.
Thank you. I'll call you again.
Hello. How's everything?
My back hurts.
Oh, dear. Does your back hurt?
Yes, it does.
Is it bad? Did you go see a doctor?
No. I just got some pain relief patches from the pharmacy.
It should get better soon.
Maybe it's because of the long ride I had. I visited my hometown recently. I think riding the car for a long time caused this pain.
I see. You should be careful when driving for a while.
Oh, I didn't drive. I sat in the passenger seat. I would've been even more tired if I drove.
That's good. But make sure you take breaks next time.
I'm not going to go that far from now on. I had to sit uncomfortably for a long time because of the traffic.
Oh, it's tiresome when there's traffic. It's best to just take a break then.
We did but I guess it wasn't enough. I'll get better, though.
Don't worry. It will.
Sure. You can go now.
Alright. Take care.
Hello. How's your day?
It's great.
That's good news! What happened?
Our village foreman gave me a gift set for Thanksgiving.
Wow! Good for you! I wish I could get a gift, too.
You can give presents to the people you're thankful to.
Should I?
Do you have anyone you're thankful to?
Hmm... Well, my family.
Who else?
Hmm... My friends!
Then why don't you give gifts to your friends and family?
Oh, I will!
You can find greater happiness when you give.
Really?
Of course. You can find true happiness when you see the person you give the present being happy.
That's true. I sometimes give little gifts to my acquaintances.
That's nice.
Thank you. It feels good to get a compliment.
Well, enjoy Thanksgiving. Let's talk again next time.
Okay. Take care.
Bye.
Bye.
Hello. Do you have any plans for the day?
I'm going to go to e-mart.
I see. Are you going with someone?
No, I'm going by myself.
Okay. When are you planning on leaving?
Maybe after lunch?
Did you eat? What did you have?
Not yet. I'm going to eat now. I'm going to have the leftover pork feet from yesterday.
That sounds delicious. I like that, too.
You do? I usually make fried rice with vegetables and pork feet. It's amazing.
Really? I should try it sometime.
It is.
That's great. Enjoy your lunch!
Sure.
And have a nice day.
Hello. Did you eat yet?
Of course.
Good. You didn't lose your appetite, did you?
No, I didn't.
Don't skip any meals even if you do.
Okay. I always try to eat regularly.
That's good to hear. Keep it up.
I used to just eat whatever. But my stomach got into a bad condition and I had to go through an operation. Now, I'm extra careful when I eat.
Oh. I'm glad you're okay now, though.
People are silly. They always have to go through it to realize what they need to do. I finally started to care about my diet after losing my health. Now I don't binge eat and try to eat healthily.
Right. Regular exercises and a healthy diet can keep you healthy.
That's very important. I realized it too late.
I know. If you're sick, you're the only one suffering from it. So please don't be sick and stay healthy.
Alright. I'm doing a lot better now that I started to care about my health. I wish I started earlier. But if I think about it, I was just too busy trying to make a living.
It's alright. It's good that you realized now. You'll get better and better so don't worry.
Oh, okay. Thank you.
No problem. Let me know anytime if you need me.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
No. I just can't sleep at night these days. Maybe I nap too much.
Really? Is it because you have any concerns?
No. I just think it's a habit now. I used to stay awake at night.
That could be it. I can't sleep at night if I nap for too long.
I guess it's the same for everyone. I should nap for shorter times but I just can't wake up.
True. So I've been drinking warm milk before going to bed.
To sleep deeply?
Yes! I heard warm milk helps you calm down and feel comfortable. That leads to good sleep.
I see. I just watch TV. I fall asleep without knowing.
Oh, really? Which program do you watch?
I just watch whatever's on at the time. Something like documentaries.
I see. Thanks for sharing!
I hope it helped. I just thought something too dramatic wouldn't be good to watch before falling asleep.
Okay, thanks for the advice. I'll ask other questions when I have any.
Sure thing.
Okay, take care.
Hi. Are you working out these days?
I do this and that. I climb and do yoga.
Really? Where do you usually exercise?
I take yoga classes at the community center. For climbing, I just to go a nearby mountain.
I see. Do you do any other activities?
No. I used to swim but now that it's cold I switched to yoga.
That makes sense. I just feel lazy these days. Maybe it's because of the weather. I'm thinking of going to a sauna this weekend.
Sauna sounds good. I'd love to go but the ones in my neighborhood all closed down. Now I have to go to a different neighborhood.
That's a pity. It might be better to just stay home, then.
I really do want to go, though. Maybe I should take the bus and go.
Sure. Or you can always take a taxi.
Maybe. I just want another one to open in my neighborhood.
I know. Then you can go more often.
I'm sure there are other old ladies like me in the neighborhood. I think someone will open one soon. I wish I could open it.
I like that joke.
I know. I'm broke. I can barely support myself.
I'm sure you can do it if you want to. I'm always on your side!
Don't even start. I'm really broke! Well, enjoy your sauna trip this weekend.
Thank you. I'll call you again.
Hello. How was your weekend?
My weekend?
Yes. Did you do anything special?
I just cleaned up the house.
Wow! How do you do that? I should stop being lazy. Do you do any exercises?
Not really. But I can't stay still. I have to constantly move around.
I see. But don't make yourself exhausted.
Of course. Well, I do get tired at night when I walk around the whole day.
You must be. I've been drinking warm milk before going to bed.
Why milk?
I heard it helps you sleep. Someone I know recommended it when I told him I had insomnia. I think it's working.
I see. I don't have insomnia.
That's lucky. Stay healthy.
I should. I'm going to take care of myself.
I'll call you again. Bye.
Hello. How's everything?
My respiratory system is having some problems.
Really? Did you go see a doctor?
I couldn't breathe the other day when I was cold. I had to go to the emergency room.
Oh, dear. Are you alright?
I still need to be careful.
You always have to be careful.
When you can't breathe all of a sudden, you get a panic attack. I may be old, but I'm still scared of dying.
Of course. As I age, I think about death and it scares me.
Old people always say they don't want to live any longer but I'm sure in their mind, they want to live longer. It's an instinct. I also have that instinct.
I know. But it feels much better now that I have it out of my system.
I know, right? People try to avoid the topic, but I think it's better to openly talk about it. Maybe it won't be as scary as before.
Right. And it'd be nice to help and empathize with those who are suffering.
I agree. I would've already been dead if the lady next door didn't help me. It's good to help each other. Everyone grows old eventually.
Right. I hope you can live like that.
I do, too.
I'll call you again, then. Enjoy the rest of the evening.
Hi. How are you today?
I feel like I took a load off my shoulders.
Really? Did something good happen?
I paid back all my debt.
Wow! Congratulations! You must be so happy!
I really am. I felt like I was always under pressure and finally, I got rid of it as of today.
I wish you well in the future as well.
I've been saving up and restrained myself from buying clothes or food to pay back my debt. I'm finally done.
I'm so happy for you. Now you can wholeheartedly enjoy your life.
Yes, I'm finally free. I feel as if I'm floating in the air.
I'm really happy for you. Thank you.
Thank you. I should celebrate today. Just a small celebration by myself and for myself.
Enjoy it. I'll call you later.
Sure. Thank you.
Take care.
Hello. Do you have any plans today?
I have dinner plans.
Really? What are you going to do?
I'm going to have a drink with a friend.
I see. What are you planning on doing until then?
I'll just drop by the community center and spend my time there.
I see. Take care.
Alright. I heard there's a dance class of some sort today.
Wow! That's cool. I'd love to take a class sometime.
You know how much I love parties. I can't miss a dance class.
I knew it! Enjoy your time.
Well, I can warm up by dancing a bit and then go for a drink afterward. I'm so excited.
You're making me feel excited, too.
Really? I'm in a good mood.
Thank you. I'll call you again.
Hello. Did you eat?
I don't feel like eating.
Why? Are you sick?
It's my teeth. I think it's because I'm getting old.
Oh, that sounds uncomfortable.
I should've gone to the dentist a long time ago. I'm too scared to go now.
But you should go before it's too late.
I should, right?
Plus, you need to exercise!
Yes, I heard exercising is important for your health.
I know. I didn't exercise at all but now I try to.
That's amazing. I just can't seem to start.
It's hard at first but you get used to it in no time.
The first time is always the most difficult.
Let's do it together!
I feel so much better with your encouragement.
It's nothing. I'll call you more often.
It's good to hear your voice. Call me from time to time.
I will. Take care.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
Nope.
Why? Is anything bothering you?
I'm scared of thieves. I'm just too scared.
Is it bad?

Yes. My house was robbed last time. The thief took everything. The food in my fridge, my medicines, and even my pain relief patches! I thought I lived long enough to experience all sorts of things but I never expected something like this.
Oh my... That sounds terrible.
Since then, I can't sleep at night. I'm too scared to fall asleep. I even leave the TV on all night.
But you're okay, right?
I'm fine during the day. But at night, it's dark and I get scared. I mean, I'm scared of a lot of things.
I know what you mean. I often get scared when I'm alone.
Some big guys kick on my door at night. They're looking down on me because I'm an old man living alone.
They are so mean! You should do something about it.
I reported it to the police. I'm definitely going to catch them. F*** them.
I really hope the police catch them so they can get punished.
I'm really going through all sorts of things.
Don't worry. Everything will be alright.
I think I need to let this anger out of my system. I'm going for a walk. I'll talk to you later.
Sure thing. I'll call you again.
Hello. Are you into any exercises these days?
I've been doing yoga with my daughter. It hasn't been long, though.
You're doing it with your daughter? How old is she?
I think she's 57. Why?
Oh, I meant how old your daughter is. You seem to be close to her.
Yes, my daughter is 57. We're close. That's why we do yoga together.
I see. It must be nice to exercise together.
It is. I like how we can take care of each other while taking the class.
That's great. Keep on the good work.
I will. I feel much better than just staying home.
I totally agree. Do you do any other workouts?
Not at all. After I take my yoga class, I get so tired and fall asleep early.
I see. How was today?
I just came back and had dinner. I'm just chilling.
Oh, have you been eating healthy?
Of course. I never skip a meal.
That's nice. I'll call you again
Hello. How was your weekend?
It was really nice.
That's good. I went hiking with my friends during the weekend.
To where?
To Mount Bukhan!
How many of you went?
Four in total.
You just be close.
We are. We haven't met for a while and had so much to talk about.
Sounds like a lot of fun. I also went out with my family.
That's nice, too. Did you eat anything nice?
We packed our own food. Kimbab and fruits. It was good.
I see. Oh, it's almost dinner time. What are you going to have?
Maybe tofu rice bowl.
Sounds delicious. Enjoy!
Okay, take care.
You, too.
Hello. How's your health?
I threw up.
Oh, are you alright?
Not at all.
Did you take some medicine?
No, I just had water.
You should have some peptic. What if it gets worse?
I threw up everything I ate so I don't think I need to have peptic.
What about drinking some warm water?
That's what I'm doing now.
I hope you get better soon.
It's because of the long ride. I get sick in cars.
Oh, I see. It must be hard.
I thought I was going to die because of nausea.
Is it better now?
It's much better now that I vomited.
At least you feel better. You should be careful.
It's always been like this. I sat on the shotgun but I still got sick.
I remember feeling nauseous and dizzy whenever I rode a bus when I was little.
Same for me. I still can't endure long rides.
Wouldn't it get better, though? I mean, if you practice.
I'm too scared to be in the car or go somewhere.
I know. It's hard. But I guess it could get better if you take short rides more often.
I guess. I'll have to prepare everything I could if I have to go somewhere. Thanks for listening.
No worries. I just wish you to be healthy.
Hello. How are you feeling today?
I'm always good. It's even better now that you called me!
Really? I'm glad to hear that.
How about you?
I'm in a good mood. Maybe it's because I've been working out lately.
Wow. Maybe I should start, too.
What do you want to try?
Well, do you have any recommendations?
What about going to the gym or swimming?
There's no gym or swimming pool in my neighborhood. I live in the countryside.
Hmm... Then what about hiking?
That's alright. The mountain here isn't that high. And the view is beautiful.
I know! It feels like I can do anything when I look down from the top of the mountain.
I should try climbing the mountain if the weather's nice.
Yes, you should!
Alright. Thanks for the tip.
No worries. I should get going now. Enjoy your day.
You're going to hang up already? Let's talk for a bit more.
Okay.
Did you eat yet?
No, not yet. I'm going to eat soon.
Oh, you should go and eat then. Go now.
Okay, I will.
Alright. Call me later.
Take care.
Hello. Are you having a great day?
Oh, yes. I was looking at the flowers in my backyard.
Wow, really? What kind of flowers are they?
There are hydrangeas, daffodils, and azaleas. I love flowers so I planted a lot.
I see. What's your favorite?
I like all flowers. But my favorite is magnolia. I even have a magnolia tree in my yard.
I see. Mine is daffodil. They bloom beautifully in front of my house in spring.
I have daffodils in my yard. They're yellow and small. They're so pretty.
I know, right? I want to live in a house with a yard, too.
That's the best. Especially when you get old, it's nice to have a backyard.
Really? I haven't had lived alone yet, so I have no idea.

You can plant flowers and vegetables. You can even eat the vegetables you grew. You can dry peppers in the sun and when it rains, you can just sit and watch the rain. You can dry your laundry in the sun... It's just nice.
It seems like the elderly have so much wisdom.
If there's a backyard, you don't have to go somewhere. I'm really happy I moved to this house.
That's good to hear. I'm really happy for you.
Thank you.
It's nothing. I'll call you often.
Hello. Did you eat yet?
No, I'm not hungry. I had chicken last night and I guess it's not digested yet.
I see. But you shouldn't skip your meal!
I'll just skip breakfast. If I feel better, I'll have lunch.
Okay. Is there anything or any snack you're craving for?
Not at the moment.
What do you usually enjoy eating?
Normally, I eat everything. I'm a foodie but I'm not good with spicy food.
I see. I'm not a picky eater, either.
It's best to have a balanced meal. You can absorb more nutrients that way.
Right. I'm trying to balance out my food.
I'm not picky either. But it's a bit tough to have a balanced meal since I live alone. I go for stored food because I just can't eat everything I buy at the grocery store. They all end up rotting.
Oh... Then let me know if you're craving something.
Sure. I'll let you know.
Thank you. Have a great day.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
I think I only slept for 4 hours.
You must be tired. What happened?
My dog was a bit sick over the night. I had to keep an eye on him.
Oh. How's he doing?
He got better after seeing the vet. He wasn't feeling too well. Maybe that's why he threw up.
That's a relief. You must be, too.
I know. I'm glad he's okay now.
What about you? Is everything alright?
Me? I'm fine.
But you also need to look after yourself.
I know. It's my loss if I'm sick.
I'll keep in touch.
Alright. Take care.
You, too.
Hi. Is there a particular sport you've been doing regularly?
I've tried pretty much everything. Swimming, running, aerobic, kickboxing, and even yoga and pilates.
Wow! You did try a lot! Which one was your favorite?
My favorite is pilates. That's what I'm doing these days. The teachers all have beautiful body lines.
Oh, really? I'd love to learn, too.
Pilates is great for fixing your body postures. It helps you develop your core. It looks pretty easy but it's not as easy as it looks.
I see. I hope you get even healthier!
You need to exercise until you die. You don't exercise to live longer. You exercise to be healthy.
I agree. And you need to live a healthy long life.
It's not about how long you live. It's all about living healthily. I mean it.
Okay, I'll keep that in mind.
Hello. Did you enjoy your weekend?
I did.
I went hiking with my friends.
Oh, sure.
It felt so nice with the fresh air and great view.
I see.
Maybe that's why I'm feeling too energetic today!
Sure.
Do you have any worries by any chance?
Oh, no.
That's a relief.
Sure.
Then, I'll call you again.
Alright.
Bye.
Hi. Is everything alright?
What did you say?
Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to say that.
What?
Is it stuffy to stay at home?
I can't hear you.
You can't hear me?
No.
Then what about going for a walk?
A walk?
Yes. It might be refreshing to go out and feel the wind.
You want me to go out?
Yes. It's nice to be out in the sun and exercise, too.
Should I?
Of course! When do you plan on going out?
When am I going out?
Hmm... Are you going to go out now or later?
Later.
Okay. Take care.
Hello. How are you feeling?
I have no idea.
Oh... Is everything alright?
There's nothing special. It's just that I don't know how I feel.
Let's start with questions, then. When was your happiest moment these days?
Recently, it was when I was cooking. I love to cook.
Oh, really? Which food do you like to cook?
I like to cook Italian.
Wow! You must be good at cooking!
People tell me that.
That's great! Then what's your favorite food?
Pizza.
Oh, I like it, too! What's your favorite type?
I like Italian pizza. Not the American one. My favorite is Margherita pizza.
I see. I'll make sure I try that later.
You should. It's the most basic pizza.
I sure will.
Hello. Are you having a great day?
It's really annoying.
Why? What's wrong?
I went here and there to get ramen. But the whole neighborhood doesn't have the one I want.
Oh... That could be annoying.
I walked around in the burning sun. My grandson said he wanted to try the new Korean Fire Noodles so I was trying to get him one. But I can't find a place selling it in my neighborhood.
Oh, that must've been hard. What about in other areas?
Other areas? I can't go that far.
I see. Then what about ordering it online?
My grandson said it's all sold out.
Really? That's a pity. But I can tell how much you love your grandson.
I raised him when he was little. I'd do anything for my little Junho.
I guess all parents feel the same way.
Of course. He's in high school now but to me, he's still just a little kid.
He's already in high school?
He is. You'll be surprised if you know how tall he is. He's already over 6'7".
Wow. He grew up a lot. He'll continue to grow even more.
He will. He eats a lot. Anyway, I feel bad I couldn't get the ramen he wanted.
There'll be another chance. I'm sure you'll be able to get it next time.
Do you think so? Thank you for understanding my feelings.
It's nothing. I'm just glad I helped.
Call me again.
I will. Take care.
Hi. Did you eat well?
I did.
What did you have?
I had rice cake soup.
That sounds good. I want to eat it, too.
Do you? I bought the rice cake from the store I go to often. Their rice cake is really good.
I'm glad it was tasty.
Sure.
It's almost the weekend. Do you have any plans?
I'm just going to cram through the dramas I missed.
I see. Which one did you watch recently?
The Hospital Playlist was fun. I might watch the rerun this weekend.
I see. Can you recommend other dramas or movies you liked?
Other ones? I just watch whatever's on TV... I usually forget about it after watching it.
Oh, I see. But you still need to enjoy the cultural life.
For me, that's TV. Watching TV is so much fun.
That's true. That's the good part.
If you have a TV at home, you can watch pretty much anything easily. It's cheap, too! When you get old, you'll be bored without a TV.
I use my smartphone or a tablet to watch videos now but I used to watch it on TV in the old days.
Right. There are so many other things to enjoy now. At my age, TV's all we got.
I wish you keep on enjoying life.
I sure will.
I'll call you again. Take care and stay healthy.
Hello. Did you sleep well?
I can't remember the last time I slept so well.
That's good news! Did you have any dreams?
Dreams? Now that you mentioned it, I think I did.
Which dream was it?
There were a bunch of pigs!
Really? You must've been surprised.
I was but I need to buy a lottery ticket.
Really?
Dreams about pigs are considered to be lucky. Or it could be a baby dream.
I doubt it.
Who knows? My kids have been married for a while. Maybe one of them is pregnant.
That could be possible! That would be good news!
I'm happy just by the thought of it. I really want a grandchild.
A grandchild! The baby will be so cute.
I know. Oh, dear. What am I even talking about?
It's alright.
I talked too much and it's our first time talking!
Really, it's fine.
I'm just a little embarrassed.
Don't worry about it. Consider me as a good friend.
I'll give it a try. Maybe next time.
Sure thing.
Then, I'll talk to you again.
Okay, Take care.
Okay.
Bye.
Hello. Do you regularly play any sports?
I sometimes golf.
Really? I wanted to learn. Is it hard?
Well... It depends on the person. But it wasn't that hard for me.
I see. Where do you usually golf?
I practice a lot at the screen golf. I think I go out to a golf course once a month.
You even golf at the field? That's amazing!
It's really fun if you golf with your friends. We make a bet on lunch or dinner.
Oh, I see.
Have you ever played golf before?
No, not yet. I'd love to learn, though.
I found it easier to start with golf games. It helps with remembering the rules. It's also easier when you actually play it in person.
Thanks for the tip!
It's not hard. You just need to practice.
I'll try!
Today's beautiful. I think I should go out for a walk.
Alright. Take care!
You, too.
Bye.
Hi. How was your weekend?
It was good. What about you?
It's always the same for me.
Did you stay home?
I didn't have any other plans so I stayed home.
I see.
Maybe that's why I feel so clumsy.
You have to be active and go out to stay healthy.
I think so, too! I'm going to go exercise next week.
Did you eat?
No, not yet. But I will soon.
What are you going to have?
Just some bread and milk.
Would that be enough?
It is.
I guess you're not a big eater. I'm thinking of having short rib soup.
That sounds delicious. Enjoy your meal!
You, too.
Thank you.
I'll talk to you again some other time.
Sure, take care.
Hello. How's your health these days?
My arms hurt.
Really? Does it hurt bad?
It's okay. It's in a cast.
Oh, I didn't know. I hope it gets well soon.
I hope so, too. It's so inconvenient since I can only use one arm. I can't wash up, go grocery shopping, or even eat comfortably.
I know. When you eat, it'll be hard to use a spoon or chopsticks.
Right. So I just have something simple.
But then it won't be a balanced diet.
I can't help it for now. I try to eat healthy, though.
I see. But you need to eat well. You'll stay healthy if you do.
Okay.
And I think it'll be better if you exercise regularly.
I will once my arm recovers.
Alright. I hope it recovers fast.
Okay.
I'll call you again. Have a great day.
